item.description: Carbonaut Concepts Overview # TBD documentation not yet added

Carbonaut Architecture # To get an overview of the resource consumption of a cloud native system, you need to combine different data sources with each other. Carbonaut should be the platform to facilitate the data integration and transformation. To explore the architecture of the carbonaut system we first start with the data sources. Data Sources # These data sources can be integrated dynamically (we add a data stream to the system) or static as (we use a configuration file to select a formular).
Carbonaut Plugins # TBD documentation not yet added
